sourcesContent:
<template>
  <div />
</template>
<style lang="scss">
@at-root html{
  scroll-behavior: smooth
}

@at-root body{
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
}

.container,
.container-grid{
  margin: auto;
}

.container-grid > .row{
  display: grid;
  grid-column-gap: 15px;
  grid-row-gap: 15px;
}

.row{
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
}
.row > div{
  flex-grow: 1;
}
.container > .row > div{
  padding-left: 15px;
  padding-right: 15px;
}

button,
a{
  cursor: pointer;
  outline: 0;
}

/* Custom, iPhone Retina */
@media only screen and (min-width : 280px) {
  .container > .row {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .column-1 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 100%;
    flex: 0 0 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
  }

  .column-1,
  .column-2,
  .column-3,
  .column-4,
  .column-5,
  .column-6,
  .column-7,
  .column-8{
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-direction: row;
  }
}

/* Extra Small Devices, Phones */
@media only screen and (min-width : 576px) {
  .container,
  .container-grid{
    max-width: 540px;
  }
}

/* Small Devices, Tablets */
@media only screen and (min-width : 768px) {
  .container,
  .container-grid{
    max-width: 720px;
  }
  .container > .row {
    margin-left: -15px;
    margin-right: -15px;
  }
}

/* Medium Devices, Desktops */
@media only screen and (min-width : 992px) {
  .container,
  .container-grid{
    max-width: 960px;
  }

  .column-2 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 50%;
    flex: 0 0 50%;
    max-width: 50%;
  }

  .column-5 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 20%;
    flex: 0 0 20%;
    max-width: 20%;
  }
  .column-6 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 16.6666666667%;
    flex: 0 0 16.6666666667%;
    max-width: 0 0 16.6666666667%;
  }
  .column-7 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 14.2857142857%;
    flex: 0 0 14.2857142857%;
    max-width: 0 0 14.2857142857%;
  }
  .column-8 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 12.5%;
    flex: 0 0 12.5%;
    max-width: 0 0 12.5%;
  }
}

/* Large Devices, Wide Screens */
@media only screen and (min-width : 1200px) {
  .column-3 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
    flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
    max-width: 33.333333%;
  }
  .column-4 > div{
    -ms-flex: 0 0 25%;
    flex: 0 0 25%;
    max-width: 25%;
  }
  .container,
  .container-grid{
    max-width: 1140px;
  }
}


.h-left {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}
.h-center {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}
.h-right {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-end;
}
.v-center {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  height: 100%;
}

.full-screen {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
}

.gutter {
  grid-gap: 15px;
}

.left-icon {
  position: relative;
  display: block;

  i {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;

    img {
      width: 100%;
    }
  }
}

.right-icon {
  position: relative;
  display: block;

  i {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;

    img {
      width: 100%;
    }
  }
}

// FLEX //
.f-no-wrap {
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
}
.f-wrap {
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

// DISPLAY //
.d-flex {
  display: flex;

  > * {
    flex-grow: 1;
  }
}
.d-block {
  display: block;
}
.d-inline-block {
  display: inline-block;
}

// OVERFLOW //
.o-hidden-x {
  overflow-x: hidden;
}
.o-hidden-y {
  overflow-y: hidden;
}
.o-hidden {
  overflow: hidden;
}

.o-scroll-x {
  overflow-x: scroll;
}
.o-scroll-y {
  overflow-y: scroll;
}
.o-scroll {
  overflow: scroll;
}

// MARGIN //
.m-auto {
  display: block;
  margin: auto;
}

// TEXT //
.txt-left {
  text-align: left;
}
.txt-center {
  text-align: center;
}
.txt-right {
  text-align: right;
}
.txt-ellipsis {
  width: 95%;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
</style>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'layout-grid' 
}
</script>
